_header: For to say having none authority
_description: One stanza rhyme royal signed by John Merely on unusual behaviour by ‘ane ydell parson’

Bod546.First Lines:
for to sayd havyng non AtorryteNor discryt offere to noryse
                    sapience…
Bod546.Last Lines:
…Yt is a thyng frustrat and of small valurfor Ane ydell parson
                    to vse suche panderic behavyour
